path /v3/offchain/ada/transfer
opid adatransferoffchain
params None
sum send ada from a virtual account to the blockchain
reqBody
oneof
type object
props
address
desc blockchain address to send assets
maxlength 90
minlength 110
type string
amount
desc amount to be sent in ada
maxlength 38
type string
pattern ddd
compliant
desc compliance check if withdrawal is not compliant it will not be processed
type boolean
fee
desc fee to be submitted as a transaction fee to blockchain if none is set default value of 1 ada is used
type string
pattern ddd
index
desc derivation index of sender address
maximum 2147483647
type integer
mnemonic
maxlength 500
minlength 1
desc mnemonic to generate private key for sender address either mnemonic and index privatekey or signature id must be present  depends on the type of account and xpub
type string
xpub
desc extended public key xpub of the wallet associated with the accounts should be present when mnemonic is used
maxlength 192
minlength 1
type string
paymentid
desc identifier of the payment shown for created transaction within tatum sender account
maxlength 100
minlength 1
type string
senderaccountid
maxlength 24
minlength 24
desc sender account id
type string
sendernote
maxlength 500
minlength 1
desc note visible to owner of withdrawing account
type string
required
senderaccountid
address
amount
mnemonic
xpub
index

type object

address

type string
amount
desc amount to be sent in ada
maxlength 38
type string

compliant
desc compliance check if withdrawal is not compliant it will not be processed
type boolean

desc fee to be submitted as a transaction fee to blockchain if none is set default value of 1 ada is used

pattern ddd
from
desc blockchain address to send assets from
maxlength 90

type string
signatureid
type string
format uuid
desc identifier of the mnemonic / private key associated in signing application
when hash identifies mnemonic index must be present to represent specific account to pay from
